anathema: Abandon others while you retreat, engage in needless destruction or bloodshed, intentionally fall asleep or grow lax on watch
edict: Protect those weaker than you; remain alert for danger; create, maintain, or patrol defenses
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Arqueros (The Golden Bulwark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=645)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 11

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Protect those weaker than you; remain alert for danger; create, maintain, or patrol defenses

**Anathema** Abandon others while you retreat, engage in needless destruction or bloodshed, intentionally fall asleep or grow lax on watch

**Area of Concern**
Bodyguards, protection, watchfulness

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2348)

- **4th**
[Mountain Resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610)
(appears as gold skin)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1751)

</column>
name: Arqueros (The Golden Bulwark)
